author: Guangxi Minority Languages Orthography Committee. 2008.
notes: Guangxi Minority Languages Orthography Committee. 2008. Vocabularies of Guangxi ethnic languages [广西民族语言方音词汇]. Beijing: Nationalities Publishing House [民族出版社].The selected variant is that of Xidi 昔地屯, Liula village 六拉村, Jinxiu County 金秀县, Guangxi. The informants are Su Xiaohua 苏少华, 52, and Liu Shaozhen 刘绍真, 75.Tones:1 = /51/2 = /231/3 = /24/4 = /11/5 = /55/6 = /214/7 = /24/, /55/8 = /11/, /24/
